Content: The iron-hard fist of a Brawler. Strikes true.
An old greatbow passed down as a family heirloom. Not the strongest, but it'll do.

A handmade quiver, designed for quickly drawing arrows. Once owned by an archer named 'Trusy Nick', who was said to always carry a variety of arrows.
Quickdraw quivers recharge automatically outside of combat.
A ring made to defy the gods.
Selene & Helios, Defenders of the Divine
